meanings.sent1: There were overmany toys scattered across the floor.
meanings.sent2: She had an overmany amount of clothes in her closet.
meanings.sent3: The cake was decorated with overmany candles, making it a fire hazard.
meanings.sent4: The garden was filled with overmany flowers, creating a colorful paradise.
meanings.sent5: The overmany stars in the sky twinkled brightly on a clear night.

meanings.definition: More than enough; an excessive amount.
meanings.sent1: He brought overmany snacks to the party, leaving no room for others.
meanings.sent2: The project had an overmany supplies, making it difficult to organize.
meanings.sent3: The overmany toppings on the pizza made it impossible to pick up a slice.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room in an overmany way, filling it with joy.
meanings.sent5: The overmany books on the shelf threatened to topple over at any moment.
